p: Based on the PCA analysis shown ( Figure 1A,B), each sample from the plant parts of the Curculigo species was divided into their respective group, namely, leaves, petiole, and rhizome, with a total variance value of the first two main components of 98% (PC-1, 93% and PC-2, 5%) and 95% (PC-1, 61% and PC-2, 34%).
